djangotailoring.tracking.views¶

View Mixins¶

class djangotailoring.tracking.views.LogPageViewMixin¶

Can be mixed with any Django Generic View class to provide logging with the djangotailoring.tracking.decorators.log_page_view() decorator.

For example:

class LoggingRedirectToHomeView(LogPageViewMixin, RedirectView):
    url = '/'

The above is a view that will redirect users to the home page of the site, and log that action on the way through.
